Parameters:
image - The image to draw.

drawGameObject

public static <T extends GameObject> void drawGameObject(T obj,
                                                         org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 location,
                                                         Camera cam)
Draw a game object at a different location in the world. That is, override its actual location

Parameters:
obj - The GameObject to draw
location - The location of the GameObject in the world
cam - The camera object that defines the field of view.

drawBG

public static void drawBG(org.newdawn.slick.Image bg,
                          Camera cam)
Draw a background image. Will also work for foreground overlays.

Parameters:

cam - The camera object that defines the field of view.

drawWalls

public static void drawWalls(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Wall> walls,
                             org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                             org.newdawn.slick.Color colour,
                             Camera cam)
Draw walls as lines. Useful for debugging.

Parameters:
walls - Map that contains walls to draw
g - Graphics context
colour - The colour to draw the walls
cam - The camera that defines the field of view.
